"use client"; import { useState } from "react"; import { ChevronDown, Heart, Info, Play } from "lucide-react"; import "../styles/cinemas_page.css"; export default function MovieBookingInterface() { const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState("11 APR"); const [selectedLocation, setSelectedLocation] = useState("1 UTAMA"); const dates = [ { day: "TODAY", date: "11 APR", fullDate: "11 Apr 2025" }, { day: "SAT", date: "12 APR", fullDate: "12 Apr 2025" }, { day: "SUN", date: "13 APR", fullDate: "13 Apr 2025" }, { day: "MON", date: "14 APR", fullDate: "14 Apr 2025" }, { day: "TUE", date: "15 APR", fullDate: "15 Apr 2025" }, { day: "WED", date: "16 APR", fullDate: "16 Apr 2025" }, { day: "THU", date: "17 APR", fullDate: "17 Apr 2025" }, { day: "FRI", date: "18 APR", fullDate: "18 Apr 2025" }, { day: "SAT", date: "19 APR", fullDate: "19 Apr 2025" }, { day: "SUN", date: "20 APR", fullDate: "20 Apr 2025" }, { day: "SAT", date: "26 APR", fullDate: "26 Apr 2025" }, { day: "SUN", date: "27 APR", fullDate: "27 Apr 2025" }, ]; const locations = [ "1 UTAMA", "1 SHAMELIN", "AMPANG POINT", "AU2 SETIAWANGSA", "BUKIT RAJA", "BUKIT TINGGI", "CENTRAL I-CITY", "CHERAS SELATAN", "CHERAS SENTRAL", "DPULZE CYBERJAYA", "PAVILION BUKIT JALIL", "STRAND KOTA DAMANSARA", "JAYA SEKSYEN 14", "KEPONG", "MINES", "RAWANG", "SETIAWALK PUCHONG", "SUNWAY PUTRA", ]; const movies = [ { id: 1, title: "BLOOD BROTHERS: BARA NAGA", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=400&width=300", genres: ["Action", "Drama"], duration: "2 hr 9 mins", language: "Bahasa Melayu", rating: "18", showtimes: { INDULGE: [{ time: "12:15 AM", date: "12 Apr 2025" }], BEANIE: [ { time: "8:45 PM", date: "11 Apr 2025" }, { time: "11:30 PM", date: "11 Apr 2025" }, ], DELUXE: [ { time: "8:45 PM", date: "11 Apr 2025" }, { time: "9:30 PM", date: "11 Apr 2025" }, { time: "10:45 PM", date: "11 Apr 2025" }, { time: "11:30 PM", date: "11 Apr 2025" }, { time: "12:15 AM", date: "12 Apr 2025" }, ], }, status: "Available", }, { id: 2, title: "GOOD BAD UGLY (TAMIL)", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=400&width=300", genres: ["Action", "Drama"], duration: "2 hr 20 mins", language: "Tamil", rating: "18", showtimes: { INDULGE: [ { time: "9:00 PM", date: "11 Apr 2025" }, { time: "11:00 PM", date: "11 Apr 2025" }, ], DELUXE: [{ time: "11:00 PM", date: "11 Apr 2025" }], }, status: "Selling fast", }, ]; return (
{/* Date Selector */}
{dates.map((date) => ( ))}
{/* Location Selector */}
KLANG VALLEY - 1 UTAMA
i
Available
Selling fast
Sold out
FILTER BY
{/* Locations List and Movies */}
{/* Locations List */}
KLANG VALLEY
{locations.map((location) => (
setSelectedLocation(location)} > {location}
))}
{/* Movies List */}
{movies.map((movie) => (
{/* Movie Poster */}
{movie.rating}
{/* Movie Details and Showtimes */}

{movie.title}

{movie.genres.join(", ")} | {movie.duration} | {movie.language}
{/* Showtimes */} {Object.entries(movie.showtimes).map(([type, times]) => (

{type}

i
))}
))}
); }
